name: Sitecore XM Cloud
description: A cloud-native, headless CMS that offers unparalleled scalability and agility for creating and delivering omnichannel content. It is Sitecore's flagship SaaS CMS.

name: Sitecore Content Hub
description: A comprehensive solution for content strategy, planning, creation, and management, including Digital Asset Management (DAM), Content Marketing Platform (CMP), and Product Content Management (PCM).

name: Sitecore CDP
description: A customer data platform that collects and unifies real-time customer data from all sources to create a single, coherent view of each customer. It supports real-time segmentation and data activation.

name: Sitecore Personalize
description: A tool for delivering personalized, omnichannel experiences. It uses data from Sitecore CDP to trigger real-time, rule-based, and AI-driven personalization across websites, mobile apps, and other channels.

name: Sitecore Search
description: An AI-powered, headless search solution that provides relevant and personalized search results for websites. It helps users find content and products quickly and efficiently.

name: Sitecore OrderCloud
description: A composable, API-first, and headless ecommerce platform designed for complex B2B, B2C, and B2B2C commerce scenarios. It offers high flexibility for creating custom commerce solutions.

name: Sitecore Discover
description: An AI-driven product discovery tool for commerce that provides individualized search results and recommendations, helping to increase conversions and average order value.

name: Sitecore Experience Platform (XP)
description: Sitecore's traditional all-in-one Digital Experience Platform (DXP), combining content management, marketing automation, analytics, and personalization in a single, tightly integrated platform.

name: Sitecore Experience Manager (XM)
description: The core Content Management System (CMS) component of Sitecore XP, focused on managing and delivering content across multiple websites. It is the foundational layer of the Experience Platform.

name: Sitecore Stream
description: Transform your content-experience lifecycle with brand-aware AI, copilots and agents, and agentic workflows to work smarter, more strategically, and more securely.

name: Managed Cloud
description: A hosting service for Sitecore XP/XM that provides infrastructure management, scaling, and deployment support in the Microsoft Azure cloud, enabling teams to focus on development rather than operations.

name: Sitecore Send
description: An easy to use, yet powerful email marketing solution that integrates seamlessly with Sitecore's DXP solutions. Enabling teams to connect their digital experiences to email engagement with ease.

name: Sitecore Connect
description: Rapid, API-enabled integration across your entire experience stack. Seamlessly integrate your experience ecosystem with API-enabled integrations and low-code/no-code connectors.
